boardgame.name: Kings _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Things
Kings _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Things*
魔法の軍団
boardgame.description: Kings _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Things is a classic Tom Wham game of warring kingdoms in a fantasy world and the legions of things that inhabit them. The board is made from hex tiles, which allows for a different board layout every time. Utilizing an interesting flipped counter element, players attempt to out bluff one another regarding the types of things they have in their armies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; King of the Tabletop_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1986 Charles S. Roberts Best Science-Fiction or Fantasy Board Game Winner
boardgame.boardgameversion: Games Workshop / West End Games edition

1986 West End/Games Workshop English language edition. Punched and put in ziplock bags. Played once or twice. In great condition!

I purchased this on Ebay some time ago, so please read the description before you buy. This is the 1986 West End edition. The box is in acceptable condition, but was apparently stored in direct sunlight for an extended period and is extremely faded. There are also some minor stains on the front (top), though there are no rips or tears, or torn corners. There is considerable shelf wear. The components are in very good condition however. The counters have been punched but all appear to be present (at least when I played recently). They are in very good condition with some wear. The tiles, rules and racks are all in very good condition also. Four 6-sided dice are included.

All counters accounted for. Missing 1 out of 48 tiles (a forest tile, probably the second least important tile since it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s still the most land common tile type and only 37 tiles are ever in play in the game), and the counter stands (easily replaced with stands from another game such as scrabble, Acquire or Ingenious). 4 tiles are scuffed as pictured. 13 of the 351 counters have a slight printing defect as shown. Instructions in good condition. Box bowed, one corner split. Local pick up available. Only actual cost to ship charged.
